body.data:
SELECT *
FROM WINDOW.INTERCORRENCIA_PEDIDOS
WHERE 
    ( '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' = ''
      OR ID_INTERCORRENCIA = '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' )

AND 
    ( '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' = ''
      OR NOME_MOTOBOY = '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' )

AND 
    ( '{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}' = ''
      OR UPPER(TRIM(CIDADE)) = UPPER(TRIM('{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}')) )

-- ðŸ”¥ SÃ³ registros do dia de hoje
AND TO_CHAR(DATA_INTERCORRENCIA, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

-- ðŸ”¥ SÃ³ pendentes (nÃ£o aprovadas)
AND NOME_QUEM_APROVOU IS NULL;
